activities: In order to establish a new account, we collect our users' First name, Last name, and Email address. We use this information for our internal purposes, such as confirming and tracking orders, subscription or registration; analyzing statistics and demographics; and informing users of new products, services, and offers as provided by us and/or our affiliates.
